review: Some of the programs don't play in High Definition which I though If I had an HD set that it would. Other than that I'm fine with the product.

review: Works great as long as you have decent wifi.

review: Still finding new ways to use it. Cannot get the mirror function to work yet.

review: Two downsides of it:1-it doesn't let you search any thing in a language other than English.2- It doesn't play live YouTube videos.
author: Ahmad A.

review: So far I love this product. I bought the Amazon Fire box for living room tv at Christmas and this is for my bed room!
author: Cindy

review: It certainly has more options than my google chromecast, awesome for prime users. My only complaint is the components are quite big, I had to rearrange my HDMI setup, and add an extension cord so I could use it. Aside from that it's been fantastic, I'd definitely recommend it to a friend.
author: samanthapeach

review: The Fire Stick is a GREAT ITEM.A Small Package with a lot of great features. I recommend it!!!!!!!

review: Works so well I bought a second one for my sons dorm room!

review: Not the easiest to set up
